snippet: Norman Lamm acknowledged his failure in not responding more assertively to allegations about two rabbis.
abstract: Chancellor Norman Lamm announces his retirement after more than 60 years at Yeshiva University in emotional letter that includes apology for for not responding more assertively to accusations of sexual abuse from students at Yeshiva University High School for Boys.
lead_paragraph: Norman Lamm acknowledged his failure in not responding more assertively to allegations about two rabbis.

headline.main: Yeshiva University Chancellor Apologizes for Sexual Abuse Scandal
headline.print_headline: At Yeshiva University, Leader Apologizes for Abuse Scandal

keywords.value: Yeshiva University High School for Boys
keywords.name: organizations
